title: Lena Blackburne price drop plus new pricing system
author: buymycards

posts.post_title: Lena Blackburne price drop plus new pricing system
posts.post_content:
Hi, I would like to sell this Lena Blackburne card.   The front looks nice except for the large area of bird droppings on his shoulder.  The back has erased writing near the top.  The card measures exactly 2 5/8" x 1 7 /16".

[STRIKE]$17 shipped[/STRIKE].  Any type of payment is fine.

New price:

T206 $5
 + buyers premium $2
 + sellers premium $2
 + Shipping charges $2
 + Certified high end premium $2
 + Purple label premium $2
 + Handling fee $2

Total $17
minus Net54 discount of $5 =  $12 shipped


1st PM gets it.  

Thanks, Rick

posts.post_title: Big price drop plus new pricing system
